Implementations of simple finders for Keith Numbers and Primeval Numbers.

For example, the Primeval numbers, along with the number of primes they decompose to, was calculated by primeval.c up to 10 digits:
```
      number      nth
           1        0
           2        1
          13        3
          37        4
         107        5
         113        7
         137       11
        1013       14
        1037       19
        1079       21
        1237       26
        1367       29
        1379       31
       10079       33
       10123       35
       10136       41
       10139       53
       10237       55
       10279       60
       10367       64
       10379       89
       12379       96
       13679      106
      100279      122
      100379      153
      101237      188
      102347      248
      102379      311

      123479      402
     1001237      421
```
